Articles.Content: Wondering if there are any add-ons that allow adjusting the size of the circular air intakes or a procedural parts that allows one to generate a user defined intake size.

i dont think there is a mod that does that, but there is an alternate solution:

i believe you should be able to add module air intake (or whatever it's called) to the procedural parts mod for procedural intake sizes

But if you want a user defined amount of intake air or intake atm, then you probably need to make a new part module which would be more complicated.

 

Edited October 3, 2021 by Space Kerbalisation Tech

On 9/30/2021 at 2:59 PM, Fihnakis said:

adjusting the size of the circular air intakes

Sounds like Tweakscale
